noAriaHiddenOnFocusable.description:
Description

Enforce that aria-hidden=“true” is not set on focusable elements.
aria-hidden="true"can be used to hide purely decorative content from screen reader users.
A focusable element witharia-hidden="true"can be reached by keyboard.
This can lead to confusion or unexpected behavior for screen reader users.
noAriaHiddenOnFocusable.option: This rule has no specific options.
